titleStmt.title: A relation of the King of Spaines receiving in Valliodolid, and in the Inglish College of the same towne, in August last part of this yere. 1592. VVryten by an Inglish priest of the same college, to a gentleman and his vvyf in Flaunders, latelie fled out of Ingland, for profession of the Catholique religion
titleStmt.author: Parsons, Robert-c1546-1610.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from STC.
Running title reads: Of the Kinge of Spaines receaving, by the English in Valliodolid.
Identified on UMI microfilm as STC 19836a.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
